song.englishname: Gonna Be Alright (Five Two Television Album Version)

english.segment1: so what you worried bout. are you just down and out. stuck in a world of doubt. just trying to make it out. you got nowhere to bounce. I know about it now. you see I been that route. just trying to figure it out. but now theres something about. the way God works it out. dont worry about it now. cuz you gone make it out. I know you wanna shout. I know you got your doubts. but this is what I found. cmon and say it loud it goes.
english.segment2: Hey hey hey hey hey hey hey!. its gonna its gonna its gonna be alright. Hey hey hey hey hey hey hey!. dont ya dont ya dont worry about your life
english.segment3: its gonna be alright. dont worry bout ya life. I know sometimes ya fight. and you aint feeling right. ill say it one more time. that God is on your side. he said youll be just fine. he said hell be on time. so when you feel confined. you feel youre walking blind. cant see it w/ yo eyes. you want some kind of sign. well you can hit rewind. restart it every time. cause what you seek youll find. so say it here tonight it goes.
english.segment4: you dont need to worry dont you ever give up. you dont need cause hes more than enough (I said)
